name: Escape The Challenge
description:
Escape The Challenge: 24 room escape challenges with non-repetitive puzzles based mostly on logic, critical thinking & problem solving. 

ONLY 2% OF PEOPLE CAN WIN THIS GAME... CAN YOU?!

KEY FEATURES

  • 24 Unique Challenging Levels
  • 24 Different Scenarios
  • 12 Previously Unreleased Levels
  • Non-Repetitive Logical Puzzles
  • +6 Million Plays Worldwide

WE CHALLENGE YOU! 
Do you have what it takes to escape & win?  
Do you accept the challenge?
